statements: DELETE FROM films WHERE production_status = 'In Production'
DELETE FROM films WHERE title = 'The Matrix';
DELETE FROM films WHERE title = 'Avatar' AND status = 'Released';
DELETE FROM film_updates WHERE film_id = 101 AND new_status = 'In Production';
DELETE FROM Production WHERE start_date > '2021-06-30' AND film_id = 5;
DELETE FROM film_actors WHERE actor_id = 5 AND film_id = 10;
DELETE FROM film_reviews WHERE film_id = 101 AND rating < 3;
